programmes.show_name: Pat Sharp's Bad Hair - Big Tunes!
programmes.show_description: The hairvolution of rock'n'roll - the good, the bad, and the ugly. Pat Sharp is back with a countdown of classic 70s songs accompanied by dodgy 70s hair-don'ts!
Non-stop 70s rock & guitar action - all night!
From the era of glam rock, new wave and disco, it's all the hits from just one decade - the 1970s! Platform boots and flares at the ready?
Tony's pulled out quite a list of pop pinups for two hours of indulgence. Bolan, Bowie, Cassidy, an Osmond, Abba girls, Rod, and ladies' men Barry White and Demis Roussos. Phwoar!
Tracks with big TV connections! Could be theme tunes, adverts or just a song made famous by a TV show.
From the era of glam rock, new wave and disco, it's all the party hits from just one decade - the 1970s! Platform boots and flares at the ready?
Our most complete list yet of UK number 1s of the decade! Some songs just don't have videos, but 146 chart toppers do, and here they are - in order!
From the early days when soul gained that disco beat in 1973, to the turn of the decade when Blondie and Diana Ross got in on the act! Simon Bates is your dancefloor host!
If you don't get up and dance, you aren't human! Disco was the best floor show in town & once again it's time to get up & get lost in the pulse!
The voice of your childhood Derek Griffiths with 40 of those tunes you pestered your parents to buy - all top pop moments that still bring a smile & happy memories of school days!
If you don't get up and dance, you aren't human! Disco was the best floor show in town & once again it's time to get up & get lost in the pulse!
From the era of glam rock, new wave and disco, it's all the hits from just one decade - the 1970s! Platform boots and flares at the ready?
60 minutes of hits and headlines from the year Concorde, the Bionic Woman, The Honey Monster and Rentaghost all launched! And it was one of the hottest summers on record.
A complete rundown of the 30 biggest selling UK singles UK for 1976 - can you believe these were all hits 50 years ago? And if you thought Abba were at number 1 - think again!
Feelgood hits from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Platform boots & flares at the ready?
Another batch of silly songs, dodgy videos & novelty hits from the 70s. Yes every one of these was a huge hit!
Feelgood hits from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Platform boots & flares at the ready?
We're bringing the spring sunshine to you - 70s style! Every vid is full of outdoor fun - with Elton & ELO, David Soul & David Cassidy, Bee Gees & Boney M!
Tony Blackburn brings the sunshine to you - 70s style! Every vid is full of outdoor fun - with Dr Hook & ELO, Elton & ABBA, Bee Gees & Boney M!
Feelgood hits from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Platform boots & flares at the ready?
The pop nerds at NOW 70s have been into the archives and pulled out 2 hours of amazing no.1s that only spent a single week on top! Big names include Kenny Rogers, The Quo & 10cc.
Feelgood hits from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Platform boots & flares at the ready?
Every song comes from that vintage year when the sun shone all summer & Dave's band Showaddywaddy had their big number 1. Queen, Leo Sayer, Abba & Smokie also kept the hits coming.
Non-stop love songs, back to back, from the era of Leo Sayer, Carpenters, the Bee Gees and Minnie Riperton.
Another selection of classic love songs from the 70s!
